body:
So me and some other Youtubers have come together to make a massive collaboration! We are planning to make an Avicus montage of our best clips in any gamemode (Nebula,Nexus, etc.). From what I have been told this will be edited by KyloCode and go up on the Avicus channel!

The particapants so far are:
- Tynvale
- MLGPorky
- Vlad
- JK/Hactivism
- Heatless
- Legoche

We are looking for a couple more people, so if your interested please suggest yourselves! We aren't able to choose everyone so we are sorry in advance about that but we will allow time to get clips for this montage!

Send clips to: AvicusMontages@gmail.com

EDIT: Make sure that if you want any clips in the montage, you need 720p and really good quality!
body_tagged:

- Heatless
- Legoche

We are looking for a couple more people, so if your interested please suggest yourselves! We aren't able to choose everyone so we are sorry in advance about that but we will allow time to get clips for this montage!

Send clips to: AvicusMontages@gmail.com

EDIT: Make sure that if you want any clips in the montage, you need 720p and really good quality!

replies.body:
I asked earlier in this thread and it doesn't seem i got an answer, don't mean to be annoying but i need to know before i can email you:

1. Approximately how many clips am I allowed to send?
2. How long should these clips be?
3. Should I leave the commentary in the clips or should they be muted?
replies.body_tagged:
I asked earlier in this thread and it doesn't seem i got an answer, don't mean to be annoying but i need to know before i can email you:

1. Approximately how many clips am I allowed to send?
2. How long should these clips be?
3. Should I leave the commentary in the clips or should they be muted?

replies.body:
1. As much as you want (Quality over Quantity)
2. Not too long, aroun 4 mins max
3. Leave Muted
replies.body_tagged:
1. As much as you want (Quality over Quantity)
2. Not too long, aroun 4 mins max
3. Leave Muted
